short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark a site in Athabasca University's social media platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension adds toolbar bookmarks to the Athabasaca University Landing social media platform in your own account and in groups that you've joined. I created this because bookmarklets are more trouble than they're worth on Chrome, including the need to keep the bookmarks bar visible, and even if that weren't objectionable, each group would need their own bookmarklet because of the way ELGG works.

After installing, right click on the Landing icon and go to Options to save your Landing username.

This extension is not officially supported by or endorsed by Athabasca University.
